fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI

Interface ApplicationRunnable<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of the elements handled by the Arena
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Run

    public interface ApplicationRunnable<I>
    The ApplicationRunnable interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed in an Application. The class must define a method called run which takes an Arena and a Collection of items of type I.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(Arena<I> arenaModel, java.util.Collection<I> itemCollection)
      called by Application as the main routine of this last which aims is to handle the Arena and its Collection of items.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(Arena<I> arenaModel,
         java.util.Collection<I> itemCollection)
        called by Application as the main routine of this last which aims is to handle the Arena and its Collection of items.
        Parameters:
        arenaModel - An Arena of I which will be created by the Application when its method run will be called.
        itemCollection - A Collection of items which will be used by the Arena for drawing purpose.
